result.title: New molecular diagnostic qPFD tool for carrot; genetic and biochemical candidates for host resistance for the three diseases; report of the most efficient plant defence elicitors or other biocontrol agents on Alternaria leaf blight, grape downy mildew and
result.description: The qPFD tool developed for carrot that will allow the screening of bioPPPs and give information about the plant resistance status will be reported Gene expression and metabolomic analyses after the application of selected bioPPPs will be also presented for the three diseases to identify metabolites involved in plant resistance mechanisms

result.title: Report on optimal spray configuration and parameters for the different crop-disease-PPP combinations
result.description: This report will describe the experimental work and the results obtained to identify the optimal spray configuration and parameters for the cropdiseasePPP combinations under study and if applicable the adaptations to the smart sprayers needed to apply the selected bioPPPs An updated version of D41 will include results of the vineyard sprayer viability tests for the selected PPPs and will be delivered on month 31
